lucius_jealous.name: Lucius
lucius_jealous.title: The Bitter Gambler
lucius_jealous.description: A veteran arena gambler who once controlled the betting pools. Cassian's unexpected rise threatens his livelihood and status. He watches from the shadows, calculating odds, bitter about his own obsolescence.

clues.text: Drunk man muttering about lost money and ruined odds after Cassian's wins — bitter, specific, personal
Old champion names Lucius as a coward who avoids real fighters and bets on outcomes instead
Lucius's identity confirmed: desperate man clinging to power through manipulation rather than skill. He will challenge you directly when cornered.

interference_events.description: Lucius spreads vicious rumors about Cassian's fighting style, trying to damage your reputation with serious competitors
Lucius uses remaining connections to manipulate betting odds against Cassian, increasing HEAT

varro_enforcer.name: Varro
varro_enforcer.title: The Trainer
varro_enforcer.description: Cassian's trainer from the ludus. He's caught between institutional loyalty and genuine concern for Cassian's survival. Varro controls information networks and maintains an uneasy peace between the ludus and state.

clues.text: Lanista says Varro runs her networks — controls information, keeps records of who owes what to whom
Someone watches both Cassian and the State agents — surveillance has its own unseen layer
Varro's role confirmed: enforcer of the old order, but increasingly sympathetic to dissent. His protection comes with chains.

interference_events.description: Varro raises the stakes of your training, forcing harder matches to 'keep you sharp' — more pressure, harder enemies
Varro uses his network to shield you from immediate threats, buying time but increasing his leverage over you

priestess_guardian.name: The Priestess
priestess_guardian.title: The Shrine's Watcher
priestess_guardian.description: An older woman who watches from the shrine's shadows. She represents the cult's eyes on the arena. She reads Cassian not as a slave or fighter, but as a piece in a larger game. She knows his power.

clues.text: An older woman watches from the shrine colonnade, evaluating Cassian with deliberate, institutional attention
Priestess network confirmed: she coordinates shrine activities across the city. Her reach is subtle but pervasive.
Priestess knows about the ledger. She always knew. She's waiting to see what you choose to do with it.

interference_events.description: Priestess offers blessing for pious acts, increasing PIETY but deepening her institutional hold
Priestess warns you away from heretical paths, attempting to guide your choices toward cult interests
